page.title: 16Recreation continued
page.content: Many people move outside the area for recreational facilities. There are very good sports centres at nearby Calne and Swindon, the latter boasting the popular Oasis swimming pool with a diving tank and a wave machine. There is a new swimming pool at Marlborough where most of the weekly shopping is done. Most people travel to these centres by car although the local bus service is good. Swindon boasts a very good and popular theatre which is attended by some of the local children who perform in some of the productions. The two local public houses are not generally well frequented by the loal inhabitants.
